show_hover_image.description: Show or hide content fields without the need to delete the content itself.

grid_masonry.label: Masonry
grid_masonry.description: Create a gap-free layout if grid items have different heights.

grid_parallax.label: Parallax
grid_parallax.description: The parallax effect moves single grid columns at different speeds while scrolling. Define the vertical parallax offset in pixels.

grid_column_gap.label: Column Gap
grid_column_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid columns.

grid_row_gap.label: Row Gap
grid_row_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid rows.

grid_divider.label: Divider
grid_divider.description: Show a divider between grid columns.

grid_column_align.label: Alignment
grid_column_align.description: Center grid columns horizontally and rows vertically.

grid_default.label: Phone Portrait
grid_default.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size. Auto expands the columns to the width of their items filling the rows accordingly.

grid_small.label: Phone Landscape
grid_small.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size. Auto expands the columns to the width of their items filling the rows accordingly.

grid_medium.label: Tablet Landscape
grid_medium.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size. Auto expands the columns to the width of their items filling the rows accordingly.

grid_large.label: Desktop
grid_large.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size. Auto expands the columns to the width of their items filling the rows accordingly.

grid_xlarge.label: Large Screens
grid_xlarge.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size. Auto expands the columns to the width of their items filling the rows accordingly.

filter_animation.label: Animation
filter_animation.description: Select an animation that will be applied to the content items when filtering between them.

filter_style.label: Style
filter_style.description: Select the filter navigation style. The pill and divider styles are only available for horizontal Subnavs.

filter_all.label: All Items
filter_all.text: Show filter control for all items

filter_position.label: Position
filter_position.description: Position the filter navigation at the top, left or right. A larger style can be applied to left and right navigation.

filter_grid_width.label: Grid Width
filter_grid_width.description: Define the width of the filter navigation. Choose between percent and fixed widths or expand columns to the width of their content.

filter_grid_column_gap.label: Grid Column Gap
filter_grid_column_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between between the filter navigation and the content.

filter_grid_row_gap.label: Grid Row Gap
filter_grid_row_gap.description: Set the size of the gap if the grid items stack.

filter_grid_breakpoint.label: Grid Breakpoint
filter_grid_breakpoint.description: Set the breakpoint from which grid items will stack.

lightbox_image_orientation.label: Image Orientation
lightbox_image_orientation.description: Width and height will be flipped accordingly, if the image is in portrait or landscape format.

title_display.label: Show Title
title_display.description: Display the title inside the overlay, as the lightbox caption or both.

content_display.label: Show Content
content_display.description: Display the content inside the overlay, as the lightbox caption or both.

overlay_mode.label: Mode
overlay_mode.description: When using cover mode, you need to set the text color manually.

overlay_style.label: Style
overlay_style.description: Select the style for the overlay.

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.description: Set light or dark color mode for text, buttons and controls.

text_color_hover.text: Inverse the text color on hover

overlay_padding.label: Padding
overlay_padding.description: Set the padding between the overlay and its content.

overlay_position.label: Position
overlay_position.description: Select the overlay or content position.

overlay_margin.label: Margin
overlay_margin.description: Apply a margin between the overlay and the image container.

overlay_transition.label: Transition
overlay_transition.description: Select a transition for the overlay when it appears on hover.

overlay_link.label: Link
overlay_link.description: Link the whole overlay if a link exists.

image_loading.label: Loading
image_loading.description: By default, images are loaded lazy. Enable eager loading for images in the initial viewport.

image_orientation.label: Image Orientation
image_orientation.description: Landscape and portrait images are centered within the grid cells. Width and height will be flipped when images are resized.

image_transition.label: Transition
image_transition.description: Select an image transition. If the hover image is set, the transition takes place between the two images. If None is selected, the hover image fades in.

image_min_height.label: Min Height
image_min_height.description: Use an optional minimum height to prevent images from becoming smaller than the content on small devices.

image_box_shadow.label: Box Shadow
image_box_shadow.description: Select the image box shadow size.

image_hover_box_shadow.label: Hover Box Shadow
image_hover_box_shadow.description: Select the image box shadow size on hover.

image_box_decoration.label: Box Decoration
image_box_decoration.description: Select the image box decoration style.

title_transition.label: Transition
title_transition.description: Select a transition for the title when the overlay appears on hover.

title_style.label: Style
title_style.description: Title styles differ in font-size but may also come with a predefined color, size and font.

title_link.label: Link
title_link.description: Link the title if a link exists.

title_hover_style.label: Hover Style
title_hover_style.description: Set the hover style for a linked title.

title_decoration.label: Decoration
title_decoration.description: Decorate the title with a divider, bullet or a line that is vertically centered to the heading.

title_font_family.label: Font Family
title_font_family.description: Select an alternative font family. Mind that not all styles have different font families.

title_color.label: Color
title_color.description: Select the text color. If the Background option is selected, styles that don't apply a background image use the primary color instead.

title_element.label: HTML Element
title_element.description: Choose one of the HTML elements to fit the semantic structure.

title_margin.label: Margin Top
title_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

meta_transition.label: Transition
meta_transition.description: Select a transition for the meta text when the overlay appears on hover.

meta_style.label: Style
meta_style.description: Select a predefined meta text style, including color, size and font-family.

meta_element.label: HTML Element
meta_element.description: Choose one of the HTML elements to fit the semantic structure.

meta_margin.label: Margin Top
meta_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

content_transition.label: Transition
content_transition.description: Select a transition for the content when the overlay appears on hover.

content_style.label: Style
content_style.description: Select a predefined text style, including color, size and font-family.

content_margin.label: Margin Top
content_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

link_text.label: Text
link_text.description: Enter the text for the link.

link_transition.label: Transition
link_transition.description: Select a transition for the link when the overlay appears on hover.

link_margin.label: Margin Top
link_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

css.label: CSS
css.description: Enter your own custom CSS. The following selectors will be prefixed automatically for this element: .el-element, .el-item, .el-image, .el-title, .el-meta, .el-content, .el-hover-image

fields.label: Image Width/Height
fields.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.
